column4: Anyone know if the issue with the fglrx display driver has been fixed in 9.04? I have a 'ATI Technologies Inc RC410 [Radeon Xpress 200M]' video apapter and last time I tried installed 9.04 gave me problems. 'http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fglrx' is the only place I know to go to learn about bug fixes atm.
you try installing from cd or dvd? i find dvd versions have more & install better
couldn't boot on my roomie's laptop with latest cd, but could with a dvd version from 2 yrs ago
heh, strange. I'll try a Live CD again and see what happens...thanks.
